c74object.name: fl.samplerate~
c74object.digest: Convert or output values based on the sample rate.
c74object.description: For output modes the output is a single value. For conversion modes the size matches the input size. The sample rate or the nyquist frequency can be requested. Alternatively, a number of sample rate related conversions are offered.

entry.name: 1. /mode [enum]
entry.description:
Sets the type of conversion or value to output:
rate - output the sample rate in Hz.
nyquist - output the nyquist frequency in Hz.
samples-ms - convert from samples to milliseconds.
samples-seconds - convert from samples to seconds.
ms-samples - convert from milliseconds to samples.
seconds-samples - convert from seconds to samples.
normalised-hz - convert from normalised frequency to frequency in Hz.
h-normalised - convert from frequency in Hz to normalised frequency.
[0] - rate [1] - nyquist [2] - samples->ms [3] - samples->seconds [4] - ms->samples [5] - seconds->samples [6] - normalised->hz [7] - hz->normalised

entry.name: 2. /normalisation [enum]
entry.description:
Sets the reference point for normalised frequency:
rate - [0 - 1] is equivalent to [0 - sample rate].
nyquist - [0 - 1] is equivalent to [0 - nyquist].
[0] - full [1] - nyquist
